section.p: The advance directive section shall contain a narrative description of the list of documents that define the patient's expectations and requests for care along with the locations of the documents.

ol.li: SHALL conform to CCD Advance Directives Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.1)
SHALL conform to CCD Advance Directives Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.1)
[CCD] SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "42348-3" Advance directives (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC)

[CCD] SHALL contain [1..*] entry, such that it
contains CCD Advance Directive Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.17)
